title: Rengar bugged in Nexus Blitz
body:
â€‹In Nexus  Blitz after the URF event Rengar is permanently missing 200-500 hp for  the rest of the entire game. It looks like you can heal the missing HP with  W but you cant, and even if you die you are missing that hp. Its not just a visual bug, you actually are missing that HP. It also makes using your W deceptive since you visually cant tell how much you are actually going to heal (it shows actual heal amount plus the 200-500 missing HP that you cant heal). 
I reported this bug several times on the PBE  forums before Nexus Blitz went live, but is still there on live servers. This bug NEEDS to be fixed, missing200-500 hp as an assassin really sucks.
When you are playing an assassin you only have around 1800 hp, and missing 500 hp is a pretty large percentage.

replies.body: You can report Nexus Blitz bugs by replying to this [post](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/E5FEJLVP-report-your-nexus-blitz-bugs-here).

> [{quoted}](name=HeyItzSteve,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=qmWJABM1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-13T00:29:11.590+0000)
>
> You can report Nexus Blitz bugs by replying to this [post](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/E5FEJLVP-report-your-nexus-blitz-bugs-here).

This particular bug has been reported in that thread by multiple users already (including myself), so we should be all set.
